conversation.content: The images show the following: a scene with extensive burning and smoke in a forested area; a large wave crashing into a coastal city street, flooding the area; an aerial view of a town submerged in water and covered with debris; a funnel cloud forming in an open field; a residential area with widespread debris, broken trees, and destroyed houses; and a landscape with severe destruction including burnt cars and collapsed structures.

Based on your descriptions and the details in the images, identify the cause-and-effect relationships between the events shown. Match the images by explaining which events likely caused the others and justify your pairings with specific details from the images.
